Get NPE during Decoration Calculation.

I was using two workspace, both have a connection to the same Linux machine.
I expanded folder My Home/test/compilera in first workspace.
Then, I renamed compilera to compiler in my second workspace.
Went back to my first workspace, and refreshed folder test (the parent folder of compilera).  I got the following error:

This looks like a typical refresh issue -- RSE dstore tried accessing a file but the file was no longer there since it had been renamed from the other WS. I guess it's not relevant whether renaming outside RSE or in the second WS so I changed the summary -- old value was:

NPE during Decoration Calculation if rename in one WS and refresh its parent in another WS.

RSE should really be robust against changes done with outside tools on the host.
Is this something that is easy to reproduce?  I tried this a few times but I don't hit it.  I wonder whether it requires certain timing to hit it.
